DLG SPR_0
Hello there traveler, you can meet the king by heading straight. Oh and please be polite, he can get pretty angry sometimes.

DLG SPR_1
Hello.

DLG SPR_2
Greetings.

DLG SPR_3
Welcome, to my lair, i have a quest for you. You will have to travel through the mountains to find my lost crown, if you find it, you'll win the game. Good luck.

DLG SPR_4
You found the king's crown!!!

DLG SPR_5
Thank you so much for returning my crown!

DLG SPR_6
The king's crown.
